Please note that after you use JanYo Share to extract your desired app to TEMP directory, if you need to perform additional operations on the extracted application install package, make sure that you moved packages from the TEMP directory before the next time you start JanYo Share, otherwise it will be cleaned automatically. %N represents the application name, \n%V represents the version name of the application, \n%W represents the version number of the application, and \n%P represents the package name of the application.
